name: Hoshi & Ishi
description:
Hoshi and Ishi are sisters. They did not communicate for a very long time, as they were busy with their own affairs. Once, in bad weather, Isha is looking for shelter. Hoshi invites her to his apartment, where there is a warm bathroom in which you can keep warm. Isha agrees with pleasure. The sweet sister begins to share her skills and attract her sister.features
  • Visual Novel game with Sexy Content.
  • A cute and fun well written story-line.
  • 1080p window & Full Screen Options.
  • Steam achievements
